AND b.mem_name LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND a.hissue_title LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND a.hissuet_cont LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'

SELECT hotissue.HISSUE_ID, TO_CHAR(hotissue.reg_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd') as reg_dt, hotissue.HISSUE_TITLE, hotissue.HISSUET_CONT, hotissue.REQ_ID, hotissue.CATEGORY_ID, hotissue.HISSUE_PARENTID, hotissue.HISSUE_LEVEL, member.mem_name as WRITER, hotissue.writer as memId FROM( select * from member)member, hotissue hotissue WHERE member.mem_id = hotissue.WRITER AND hotissue.HISSUE_ID =#{hissueId}

SELECT hotissue.HISSUE_ID, TO_CHAR(hotissue.reg_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd') as reg_dt, hotissue.HISSUE_TITLE, hotissue.HISSUET_CONT, hotissue.REQ_ID, hotissue.CATEGORY_ID, hotissue.HISSUE_PARENTID, hotissue.HISSUE_LEVEL, member.mem_name as WRITER, hotissue.writer as memId FROM( select * from member)member, hotissue hotissue WHERE member.mem_id = hotissue.WRITER AND (hotissue.HISSUE_ID =#{hissueId} or hotissue.hissue_parentid = #{hissueId}) order by hotissue.HISSUE_LEVEL asc
